DARKVISION.title: Darkvision
DARKVISION.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and within darkness as if it was dim light.

FIRE RESISTANCE.title: Fire Resistance
FIRE RESISTANCE.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

REACH TO THE BLAZE.title: Reach to the Blaze
REACH TO THE BLAZE.description: You know the produce flame cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the burning hands spell once with this trait as a 1st-level spell, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

ACID RESISTANCE.title: Acid Resistance
ACID RESISTANCE.description: You have resistance to acid damage.

AMPHIBIOUS.title: Amphibious
AMPHIBIOUS.description: You can breathe air and water.

SWIM.title: Swim
SWIM.description: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

CALL TO THE WAVE.title: Call to the Wave
CALL TO THE WAVE.description: You know the shape water cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the create or destroy water spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

UNENDING BREATH.title: Unending Breath
UNENDING BREATH.description: You can hold your breath indefinitely while you're not incapacitated.

MINGLE WITH THE WIND.title: Mingle With The Wind
MINGLE WITH THE WIND.description: You can cast the Leviatate spell once with this trait, requiring no material components, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest.  Constitution is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

EARTH WALK.title: Earth Walk
EARTH WALK.description: You can move across difficult terrain made of earth or stone without expending extra movement.

MERGE WITH STONE.title: Merge With Stone
MERGE WITH STONE.description: You can cast the Pass Without Trace spell once with this trait, requiring no material components, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest.  Constitution is your spellcasting ability for this spell.
